snippet: "Lincoln" led in number of nominations, but "Django Unchained" got help in becoming an Oscar contender; a European settlement over e-book prices; and Kanye West's kilt made a statement at the benefit concert for victims of Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: "Lincoln" led in number of nominations, but "Django Unchained" got help in becoming an Oscar contender; a European settlement over e-book prices; and Kanye West's kilt made a statement at the benefit concert for victims of Hurricane Sandy.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Golden Globes Lift 'Django,' and Introducing Kanye's Kilt
